column4: how do I keep the screen unlocked when I come out of hibernation?
I think there's a gconf for that, but I haven't tried
where would you expect the setting to be? login? power management? just give me some keywords to scour gconf with
see gconf entry for /app/gnome-power-manager/lock . But frankly I tried enable locking for suspend but didn't work. you can try removing lock from hibernate and see if it works
